data.label: 腾讯移动分析
data.description: MTA 为您的应用（APP、H5和小程序）提供实时数据统计分析服务，监控版本质量、渠道状况、用户画像属性及用户细分行为，通过数据可视化展现，协助产品、运营和市场决策。

data.label: 腾讯移动分析
data.description: MTA provides real-time data statistics and analysis services for your applications (APP, H5, and mini-programs), monitoring version quality, channel conditions, user profile attributes, and user segmentation behavior, presenting data through visualization to assist product, operation, and market decision-making.
